verbose_text: CD38 can act as an ectoenzyme on the cell surface, depleting extracellular NAD or NADP, and producing mediators cADPR, ADPR, and NAADP that promote intracellular Ca 2+ increase, proliferation, and insulin secretion.
evidence: CD38 can act as an ectoenzyme on the cell surface, depleting extracellular NAD
